articles.title: 350-foot asteroid to pass Earth today, reveals NASA; Know how close it will get - HT Tech
articles.description: An Apollo-group asteroid has been tracked by NASA and it is likely to make its closest approach to Earth today, March 12. From size, speed to how close it will pass Earth, know all about Asteroid 2015 FM34.
articles.content: Like previous months, we've seen numerous asteroids fly past Earth in recent weeks. These space rocks come close to the planet when they interact with the gravitational field of a large planet like J… [+2132 chars]
